EmailTemplate.name: Registration Expired Email Template
EmailTemplate.subject: Registration Expired
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Your: {!License_Registration__c.Legal_Entity_Name__c} Application ID: {!License_Registration__c.License_Registration_Number__c} expired on {!License_Registration__c.Expiration_Date__c}
We have not received the {!License_Registration__c.License_Registration_Type__c} renewal application for {!License_Registration__c.Legal_Entity_Name__c}.
It is illegal to operate a {!License_Registration__c.License_Registration_Type__c} without current registration. Violators may be cited for operations with a invalid registration and found guilty of a misdemeanor.
If you wish to complete a registration application, please visit https://cadir.my.site.com/registrations to enter a new application.
Thank you, Licensing & Registration Unit
